00042 #ifndef _ZGPMIDDLEPROXY_H
00043 #define _ZGPMIDDLEPROXY_H
00044 
00045 #ifdef _GREENPOWER_SUPPORT_
00046 /******************************************************************************
00047                     Includes section
00048 ******************************************************************************/

00050 #include <zll\n_zcl_framework\include\N_Zcl_Framework_Bindings.h>
00051 #include <zll\n_zcl_framework\include\N_Zcl_Framework.h>
00052 #include <GPInfrastructure\lowZgp\include\zgpLow.h>
00053 /******************************************************************************
00054                            Definitions section
00055 ******************************************************************************/
00056 #if (MICROCHIP_APPLICATION_SUPPORT == 1) 
00057 #define ZGP_GETNEXTSEQNUMBER() ZCL_GetNextSeqNumber()
00058 #else
00059 #define ZGP_GETNEXTSEQNUMBER() N_Zcl_Framework_GetNextSequenceNumber()

00061 
00062 /******************************************************************************
00063                     Types section
00064 ******************************************************************************/
00065 typedef struct PACK
00066 {
00067   uint16_t appId                         : 3;
00068   uint16_t alsoUnicast                   : 1;
00069   uint16_t alsoDerivedGroup              : 1;
00070   uint16_t alsoCommissionedGroup         : 1;
00071   uint16_t securityLevel                 : 2;
00072   uint16_t securityKeyType               : 3;
00073   uint16_t rxAfterTx                     : 1;
00074   uint16_t gpTxQueueFull                 : 1;
00075   uint16_t bidirectionalCapability       : 1;
00076   uint16_t proxyInfoPresent              : 1;
00077   uint16_t reserved                      : 1;
00078 }zgpGpNotificationOptions_t;
00079 
00080 // GP commissioning notification command
00081 typedef struct PACK
00082 {
00083   uint16_t appId                         : 3;
00084   uint16_t rxAfterTx                     : 1;
00085   uint16_t securityLevel                 : 2;
00086   uint16_t securityKeyType               : 3;
00087   uint16_t securityProcFailed            : 1;
00088   uint16_t bidirectionalCapability       : 1;
00089   uint16_t proxyInfoPresent              : 1;
00090   uint16_t reserved                      : 4;
00091 }zgpGpCommNotifyOptions_t;
00092 
00093 typedef struct PACK
00094 {
00095   union
00096   {
00097     zgpGpNotificationOptions_t notifyOptions;
00098     zgpGpCommNotifyOptions_t commNotifyOptions;
00099   }options;
00100   ZGP_GpdId_t  gpdId;
00101   uint8_t  endpoint;
00102   uint32_t  gpdSecurityFrameCounter;
00103   uint8_t  gpdCmdId;
00104   uint8_t  gpdCmdPayload[MAX_PAYLOAD_BY_GPD];
00105   uint16_t gppShortAddr;
00106   uint8_t  gppGpdLink;
00107   uint32_t  mic;
00108 } ZGP_GpNotification_t;
00109 
00110 typedef struct
00111 {
00112   APS_AddrMode_t      addrMode;     
00113   APS_Address_t       addr;         
00114   ShortAddr_t         aliasSrcAddr;   
00115   NwkSequenceNumber_t aliasSeqNumber; 
00116   uint8_t             radius;         
00117   uint8_t             cmdDir;         //Client/Server Direction
00118   uint8_t             cmdId;          //cmdId of ZclCmd
00119 } ZGP_Addressing_t;
00120 
00121 /******************************************************************************
00122                     Externals
00123 ******************************************************************************/
00124 /******************************************************************************
00125                     Prototypes section
00126 ******************************************************************************/
00127 /**************************************************************************/
00136 bool ZGP_sendGpNotification(ZGP_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t *payload, uint8_t payloadLength);
